/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked on both sides by lush green trees and shrubs, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer. The colors in the image are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees and shrubs contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a tranquil and inviting snapshot of everyday life in Beijing.
